DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Decipher Prostate Cancer Test Score Not Obtained Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine the date on which a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue of was done for an individual in which a proprietary genetic test that evaluates a prostate cancer tumor for its potential for metastasis was not obtained.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Decipher Prostate Cancer Test Score Not Obtained
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._A proprietary genetic test that evaluates a prostate cancer tumor for its potential for metastasis. Decipher measures the expression levels of 22 RNA biomarkers involved in multiple biological pathways that are associated with metastasis and aggressive prostate cancer to classify tumors as high, average, or low risk of metastasis._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._Not acquired, gained or come to the possession.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredName: Decipher Prostate Cancer Test Score Not Obtained
Property.preferredDefinition: A proprietary genetic test that evaluates a prostate cancer tumor for its potential for metastasis. Decipher measures the expression levels of 22 RNA biomarkers involved in multiple biological pathways that are associated with metastasis and aggressive prostate cancer to classify tumors as high, average, or low risk of metastasis.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.:Not acquired, gained or come to the possession.

Concepts.definition: A proprietary genetic test that evaluates a prostate cancer tumor for its potential for metastasis. Decipher measures the expression levels of 22 RNA biomarkers involved in multiple biological pathways that are associated with metastasis and aggressive prostate cancer to classify tumors as high, average, or low risk of metastasis.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
Not acquired, gained or come to the possession.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Surgery date for patients without Decipher score obtained through standard of care testing prior to Step 0.
